Orchid flowers are considered romantic because they symbolize beauty, love, and can attract hearts.
White carnations symbolize gratitude, pure love, loyalty, and passionate and deep love.
Yellow carnations are a symbol of rejection, emotion, hatred, and disappointment towards someone.
Red carnations are interpreted as a form of admiration and friendship.
Pink carnation flower is associated with the eternal love of a mother and woman.
Purple carnation flower is associated with grief and creativity, but apart from that this flower symbolizes disorder which means you have the ability to change according to your wishes.
White daisy flowers symbolize loyalty and innocence, you can choose if the person you are going to give this flower arrangement is a gentle and calm person.
Yellow daisy flowers may represent your feelings of being happy and happy. So, if you and your loved ones are happy, you can give a daisy in this color.
Purple daisy has a gentle and mysterious meaning.
Red daisy flowers means passionate love with great passion.
Pink daisy flowers exude a sweet aura because the pink color looks soft.
Orange daisy flowers means happiness and joy.
Herbras flowers symbolize a form of beauty and gratitude that you convey for the presence of someone you consider important.
is a flower ornament plant that is most sought after and liked by everyone. Because the color and shape are beautiful, and the fragrant smell is able to arouse someone\'s feelings
Tulip flowers that are widely grown and famous in the Netherlands, are also a type of flower decoration that is much sought after. This flower grows in winter, and cannot thrive in tropical climates.

Lotus flowers are better known to the world community by the name Water lily. However, this decorative flower is not a type of lily. This flower is a flower from a plant that lives and grows on the surface of the water.
Hibiscus flowers originate from East Asia. This flower can also be used as an ornamental plant because of its beautiful colors.

Cambodian flowers originate from Central America and are widely grown in Mexico and Venezuela. This flower is better known as Plumeria, which is taken from the name of a plant expert who came from France and was famous in the 17th century, namely Charles Plumier
This flower that grows every year has a very fragrant and distinctive fragrance. This flower grows in the tropics and blooms in spring or summer..
A flower garden is incomplete if there are no Aster Plants. These beautiful flowers of many varieties and colors reflect joy, joy and simplicity.
